briefTitle: Overnight Switch Trial From Pramipexole IR to Pramipexole ER in Patients With Early Parkinson Disease
officialTitle: A Double-blind, Double-dummy, Randomized, Parallel Groups Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Switching Patients With Early Parkinson's Disease (PD) From Pramipexole IR to Pramipexole ER or Pramipexole IR

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Patients Who Successfully Switched From Pramipexole Immediate Release (IR) to Pramipexole ER After a Possible Dose Adaptation, Full Analysis Set (FAS), Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF)
